change.changenote: Regulation BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 263/2012, effective December 20, 2012.

reg.title: British Columbia Fire Code Regulation
reg.amsincluded: [includes amendments up to B.C. Reg. 44/2010, May 1, 2010]

section.sectiontext: The National Fire Code of Canada 2005 is adopted as the British Columbia Fire Code, with the amendments set out in the Schedule.

centertext.em:
Not included in this publication; published in the British Columbia
Gazette, Part II, Volume 49, No. 13, pages 293 to 309; amendments in
Volume 49, No. 23, pages 487 to 488; Volume 53, No. 3, page 61.

content.regnote: Note: this regulation replaces B.C. Reg. 318/2003.
content.provisionsnote: [Provisions of the Fire Services Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 144, relevant to the enactment of this regulation: section 47 (2)]

change.changenote: Schedule, Gazette exemption note BEFORE amended by BC Reg 44/2010, effective May 1, 2010.

centertext.em:
Not included in this publication; published in the British Columbia
Gazette, Part II, Volume 49, No. 23, pages 487 and 488.
